author: julianfoad
msg: Improve handling of "\ No newline at end of file" lines in diff and patch.
Since this feature of unified diff is not well standardized, go for maximum
portability by not localizing this message when we generate it (which we
were doing in some cases) and not requiring any particular text other than
the initial '\' when we read a patch file.
(display_prop_diffs): Tweak a comment for white-space correctness. Ugh --
(output_unified_line): Stop localizing the "No newline" string. Make this
code exactly the same as in diff_memory.c. Ugh -- why is this code
(parse_next_hunk): For recognizing no-newline-at-end, don't require the
exact message '\ No newline ...', but just an initial '\'.

author: jpountz
msg: LUCENE-2221: Use JVM intrinsics instead of BitUtil.{ntz,pop} (merged from r1411712).
